alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Guadalupe; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:34PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A few strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Guadalupe, west central Gonzales, northern Wilson and southeastern Bexar Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 334 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a few strong thunderstorms 12 miles north of Nixon, or 13 miles southeast of Seguin, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Schertz, Seguin, St. Hedwig, Elmendorf, La Vernia, New Berlin, Zuehl, Calaveras Lake, Sutherland Springs, Leesville, Parita, Belmont, Canada Verde, Sayers, Friendly Corner and Adkins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
